page.title: 08HOLIDAYS
page.content: HOLIDAY PATTERNS HAVE CHANGED DRAMATICALLY IN THE LAST FEW YEARS. MANY PEOPLE HAVE BEEN ABROAD THAT LIVE IN OUR BLOCK. POPULAR PLACES TO VISIT ARE SPAIN,GREECE AND ITALY. {"TRADES"}IS THE MAIN HOLIDAY PERIOD WITH MANUAL WORKERS IN OUR AREA. THIS LASTS FROM THE BEGINNING OF THE SCHOOL HOLIDAYS TILL THE THIRD WEEK IN JULY_ABOUT THREE WEEKS IN LENGTH. THE SCHOOL HOLIDAYS LAST FOR ANOTHER THREE WEEKS. LOW COST AIR TRAVEL AND HOTEL ACCOMMODATION MAKE IT AS CHEAP TO GO ABROAD AS A SIMILAR HOLIDAY IN THE U.K. THE RESULT OF THIS IS THAT LOCAL HOLIDAY RESORTS ARE FALLING INTO A STATE OF DECAY.
